page.title: 13CHURCH AND COMMUNITY
page.content: At{Emmanuel Church }we have services every{Sunday}and people use the church for{weddings }and {funerals. }Many in Swadlincote bring their babies for {Baptism,}usually at one of the Sunday services.{The Church Hall,}built 1973 is used on{Thursday}am for a{Coffee {Club for mothers & toddlers.}A 15 min. service (Little Church) is followed by toys, coffee & orange squash.Friday is pensioners{morning.The Tuesday Club}is for people who have been suffering from mental illness, usually recommended to come by doctors at Pastures Hospital or psychiatric nurses working in the community.Some make models some play games others just talk.Two have recently begun to work for the Social Services fitting stair rails and other aids for elderly or handicapped people.
